com.facebook.buck.skylark.function.attr

Interface AttrModuleApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.devtools.build.lib.skylarkinterface.SkylarkPrintable, com.google.devtools.build.lib.skylarkinterface.SkylarkValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttrModule

    public interface AttrModuleApi
extends com.google.devtools.build.lib.skylarkinterface.SkylarkValue
    Skylark module used to configure the attribute schema for user defined rules
